_description: James Ryman, a carol of the Annunciation — six quatrains (aaab) with refrain, ‘The whiche floure is moos pure & bright’ and burden: ‘A roose hath borne a lilly white / The whiche floure is moos pure & bright’

CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 187-8.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 131; 1977, 116.
